2053340.name: Outmode - VR Mode
2053340.description:
Experience the '80s on a whole new level.


Live through the eyes of a legendary 1980s driver and get a new idea of what it means to be an Outrunner in this immersive expansion.

Full Open VR support.

Logitech Steering Wheel support.

Only tracks headsets, no VR controller input/interaction. Keyboard/gamepad still required for play.

WARNING:
Outmode was not originally designed to be a VR game. This expansion requires a high frame rate to run with stability, it is highly recommended to play on a lower quality setting (VHS, low, medium) even with high end hardware. Please make sure your hardware meets minimum spec before purchase.
2053340.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
